net.derquinse.common.i18n

Class BundleLocalized<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.i18n.AbstractLocalized<T>
      • net.derquinse.common.i18n.BundleLocalized<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<Locale,T>, Supplier<T>, Localized<T>

    public final class BundleLocalized<T>
extends AbstractLocalized<T>
    A localized objects backed by a resource bundle. For this objects the default value is the value for the default locale.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public T apply(Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: Localized
        Returns the object for the specified locale. If no value for the specified locale is found or the argument is null, the default value must be returned. The returned value must be non-null.
        Parameters:
        locale - The requested locale.
        Returns:
        The localized object.
